Posts.Content: Is their anyone out there that had to have a tooth pulled while on cemo? This is my second time on cemo and I have a bad tooth that has to be pulled its in the top back.The Doc. set me up an appointment to see the dentist and my teeth have deep roots. I don't know how it's going to turn out with me on cemo.I always have a problem when I have a tooth pulled. Please help!                                               Rose
Posts.Title: cemo tooth

Posts.Content: Thank you for your info, I'll check on one closer. I had my left breast removed and they didn't find any cancer anywhere else. Their just giving me cemo treatment to be sure.I had my third one yesterday   Thanks again                     Rose.
Posts.Title: oral chemo

Posts.Content: Hi again   I have taken three treatments intravenous, I'm having to go  back to work in two weeks.I ask the Doc. it I could switch on oral chemo. It takes two hours to get to the hospital and then I'm their for another two hr.. I'm on the TAC cocktail. It didn't spreed anywhere else, it stayed in the breast which I had it removed, & 11 lip nodes. He said that oral chemo is just for people with cancer in the other parts of the body. Is this true?  Would someone out their  know the answer to this?                                             Thank you  Rose
Posts.Title: oral chemo

Posts.Content: I just started on my cemo. Yesterday I had my second one. I ask the Dr. if the cemo would give me a headache. He said no,but I've been getting them not real bad ever since I started cemo. I don't take anything for it I just let it go away on its own. I don't like taking pain med. unless I really have to. If anyone out their would know the answer  I would appreciate it.                                                Rose
Posts.Title: would you get headachs from cemo?

Posts.Content: Hi Linda Lou                Thank you for answering my question so quick. I did ask the doc. and he said no, but when I go back I will ask the nurse. Sometimes I think the Doc. is in a hurry and he doesn't pay much attention to us.                           Best of luck to you too.                                              Rose
Posts.Title: would you get headachs from cemo?
